xwikidoc.name: EditToolbar
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
{pre}
Basic Syntax
1 Level 1 Title
1.1 Level 2 Title
*Bold*
~~Italics~~
-- Striked--
Lists
* List item level 1
** List item level 2
** List item level 2
*** List item level 3

# Numbered list item
# Numbered list item
Links
[PageName]
[linktext>PageName]
[linktext>Space.PageName]
[linktext>http://www.myurl.com]
Images and Attachments
{image:filename.gif} inserts an image {attach:filename.doc} creates a link
Tables
{table}
Header1|Header2
item1|item2
item3|item4
{table}
{/pre}
